title: Understated Scandinavian Duplex with Workspace and Pool Access in Polesie
description: Discover refined minimalism in this four-bedroom, three-bathroom duplex that masterfully balances thoughtful design with functionality. Constructed with clean lines and an abundance of natural light, the home spans 156 sqm and boasts a dedicated home office, perfect for entrepreneurial pursuits. Relax in elegantly simple interior spaces, enjoy streamlined storage, and retreat to either of two pristine levels built for modern balance and comfort.
neighborhood_description: Located in Lodz’s trending Polesie district, this address offers both connectivity and tranquility. The neighborhood is vibrant yet peaceful, with convenient access to public transport, scenic bike lines, and highway routes. Local cafés and dynamic green spaces encourage an active outdoor lifestyle, while distant mountain vistas provide a calming backdrop to your daily routine.
lifestyle_benefits: ease of daily commute via public transport or bike
exclusive pool access for relaxation and informal networking
immediate connectivity to highways for business travel
target_buyer: Ideal for entrepreneurs and professionals seeking a tranquil yet inspiring domestic workspace, with access to recreational amenities and seamless links to Lodz’s business scene.
market_positioning: Positioned in the upper mid-range segment of the Polesie market, this duplex rebels against cluttered layouts with a focus on elegant minimalism, securing strong appeal with discerning, productivity-driven buyers.
